channel.title: consumercourt on Technical Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in consumercourt on Technical Ramblings

item.title: Reliance filed 420 case against me in Delhi consumer court
item.description: 22, June 2013 I woke up like any other morning thinking of closing a github issue.I went out to pick up food items for the weekend, once I was back my friend said “ You got a call on Tamil Nadu number”. I reverted the call and the person said “I am calling from Delhi consumer court, confirmed my name, address where I stayed in feb, 2009, added RC Gowtham has filled a 420 case against you(dc801/2013, couldn’t find status in http://164.
